sense.def:
Kdor je
lame
, ne more hoditi pravilno, ker ima zaradi poškodbe ali bolezni okvarjeno eno ali obe nogi.

seg.quote: The illness left her permanently lame.

sense.def:
Izgovor, dokaz ali pripomba, ki je
lame
, je neprepričljiv ali šibek.

seg.quote: My lame excuse was that I had too much else to do.
‘I didn't recognize you,’ Claude said lamely.
